item.description:
Twilight Rate is $65 with cart. T times are 4:10 and 4:20pm. They had no 4:00 pm. The pro shop thinks we'll probably get in all 18 but said it would be tight. If this changes anyone's RSVP please let me know. They do require a credit card to hold the reservation so any cancelations have to be made early Friday.

From their Web Site: Granite Links Golf Club at Quarry Hills, was voted “Top Ten Best New Upscale Golf Course in the US” and "Four Star Best Place to Play" and, alongside other such national notables as Pebble Beach, TPC Sawgrass, Bethpage and Kiawah Island, Granite Links was named to the 2009 / 2010 selection of the "100 Greatest Public Golf Courses in America!" by Golf Digest.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be around the pro shop just before 4pm, at the range prior to that.

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Granite Links
